mapper.select:
select
from P_DOC_CONF where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_DELETED = 0
SELECT ID_, DOC_NAME, DOC_DESC, DOC_VERSION, VERSION_NAME, DOC_TYPE, DOC_XML FROM P_DOC_CONF WHERE ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_DELETED = 0
mapper.insert: insert into P_DOC_CONF (ID_, DOC_NAME, DOC_DESC, DOC_VERSION, VERSION_NAME, DOC_TYPE, DOC_XML) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docXml,jdbcType=CLOB})

insert into P_DOC_CONF
ID_,
DOC_NAME,
DOC_DESC,
DOC_VERSION,
VERSION_NAME,
DOC_TYPE,
DOC_XML,
CREATE_TIME,
DOC_TYPE_CODE,
MODEL_TYPE,
DOC_CODE,
VERSION_TYPE,

mapper.update:
update P_DOC_CONF
DOC_NAME = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_DESC = #{docDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_VERSION = #{docVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_NAME = #{versionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_TYPE = #{docType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_XML = #{docXml,jdbcType=CLOB},
DOC_XSD = #{docXsd,jdbcType=CLOB},
MODEL_TYPE = #{modelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_CODE = #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_TYPE = #{versionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update P_DOC_CONF set DOC_NAME = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_DESC = #{docDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_VERSION = #{docVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_NAME = #{versionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_TYPE = #{docType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_TYPE_CODE = #{docTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_TYPE = #{versionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT T.ID_,T.DOC_NAME,T.DOC_DESC,T.DOC_VERSION,T.VERSION_NAME,T.DOC_TYPE,DOC_TYPE_CODE,DOC_CODE,VERSION_TYPE FROM P_DOC_CONF T
T.IS_DELETED = 0
AND T.DOC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' escape '/'
AND T.DOC_TYPE = #{versionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T.VERSION_TYPE = #{versionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (T.MODEL_TYPE = '1' or T.MODEL_TYPE is null)
AND T.MODEL_TYPE = '2'
AND T.MODEL_TYPE is null
ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(T.ID_) FROM P_DOC_CONF T
T.IS_DELETED = 0
AND T.DOC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' escape '/'
AND T.DOC_TYPE = #{versionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T.VERSION_TYPE = #{versionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (T.MODEL_TYPE = '1' or T.MODEL_TYPE is null)
AND T.MODEL_TYPE = '2'
AND T.MODEL_TYPE is null
mapper.update:
update P_DOC_CONF t set t.IS_DELETED = 1 where
(ID_ = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT T.ID_,T.DOC_XML FROM P_DOC_CONF T WHERE T.ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.IS_DELETED = 0
mapper.update: update P_DOC_CONF t set t.DOC_XML = #{docXml,jdbcType=CLOB} where t.ID_ = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(T.ID_) FROM P_DOC_CONF T WHERE T.ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.IS_DELETED = 0 AND T.DOC_XML IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(A.ID_) FROM P_DOC_CONF A,P_DOC_MAPPING B WHERE A.ID_ = B.DOC_ID AND A.ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.IS_DELETED = 0 AND B.CLOUMN_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT T.ID_,T.DOC_NAME||'_'||T.DOC_VERSION DOC_NAME, T.DOC_DESC,T.DOC_VERSION,T.VERSION_NAME,T.DOC_TYPE,DOC_TYPE_CODE FROM P_DOC_CONF T
T.IS_DELETED = 0
ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC
